Welcome to Data Visualization (STAT 2430) at Dalhousie University for Winter 2024. From this page you can access all the required elements of the course including

* the [syllabus](001-syllabus.qmd) for the whole course,
* the course [textbook](https://andrewirwin.github.io/data-viz-notes/),
* the [detailed outline](002-detailed-outline.qmd) with a plan for each class (subject to change!) and a link to slides and other materials presented in class, and
* detailed information about all work to be [evaluated](004-evaluation.qmd).

A few items are located on [Brightspace course page](https://dal.brightspace.com/d2l/home/232100)

* tasks to be submitted once a week,
* term project information: team membership, presentation schedule, and peer-evaluation schedule,
* your grades in the course.

If you have questions about the course, please ask in class, or contact me by [email](mailto:a.irwin@dal.ca).
